title: Adam Brody
itunes:title: Adam Brody
itunes:subtitle: Adam Brody [The Kid Detective, Ready or Not, Promising Young Woman, Smiley Face, The O.C.] talks with Anna about making The Kid Detective, his love for surfing, the dangers of surfing, breathing, his 30-minute Twitter lock, Marvel Whiteside Parsons, meeti
description:
Adam Brody [The Kid Detective, Ready or Not, Promising Young Woman, Smiley Face, The O.C.] talks with Anna about making The Kid Detective, his love for surfing, the dangers of surfing, breathing, his 30-minute Twitter lock, Marvel Whiteside Parsons, meeting his wife, raising kids, reality TV, and more. Later in the episode Anna is joined by dating coach, matchmaker and the founder of Level Connections, April Beyer.

Learn more about April and LEVEL by visiting  www.levelconnections.com

Thred Up Get the styles you love at a fraction of the price. You’ll look and feel good with thredUP!  And for Unqualified listeners, here’s an exclusive offer just for you: Get an extra 30% off first order at thredUP.com/anna.

ABC Home Economics ABC has a new comedy brought to you and starring the one and only Topher Grace. It’s about three adult siblings who each have wildly different financial situations.  Home Economics premieres Wednesday, April 7 th  at 8:30/7:30 central right after The Goldbergs.

Imperfect Foods Imperfect Foods is offering our listeners 20% off PLUS free shipping on your first order when you go to IMPERFECT FOODS.COM and make sure to use promo code ANNA to sign up.

Please subscribe to Anna Faris is Unqualified on Apple Podcasts and follow us on social media:

Instagram @Unqualified
Twitter @Unqualified
Facebook @Anna Faris is Unqualified
Music by: Mondo Cozmo @mondocozmo
Producers: Michael Barrett, Rob Holysz, Jeph Porter
Co-producer: Michael Sherman
Researcher: Margot Barrett

Production Services: Rabbit Grin Productions rabbitgrinproductions.com
Distributed by: Simplecast


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
